entry.data:
MOSTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE MID 80S
SOUTH WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH

MOSTLY CLOUDY
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS WITH A SLIGHT CHANCE OF THUNDERSTORMS IN THE EVENING, THEN SHOWERS LIKELY WITH A CHANCE OF THUNDERSTORMS AFTER MIDNIGHT
LOWS IN THE LOWER 60S
SOUTHWEST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN 70 PERCENT

SHOWERS LIKELY IN THE MORNING, THEN A CHANCE OF SHOWERS AND THUNDERSTORMS IN THE AFTERNOON
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 70S
NORTH WINDS AROUND 5 MPH, BECOMING NORTHEAST IN THE AFTERNOON
CHANCE OF RAIN 70 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY IN THE EVENING, THEN CLEARING
LOWS AROUND 60
EAST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH

MOSTLY SUNNY
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS AND THUNDERSTORMS IN THE AFTERNOON
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 80S
SOUTHEAST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH, BECOMING SOUTHWEST AROUND 5 MPH IN THE AFTERNOON
CHANCE OF RAIN 50 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY WITH A CHANCE OF SHOWERS AND THUNDERSTORMS
LOWS IN THE LOWER 60S
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 70S
CHANCE OF RAIN 50 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS AND THUNDERSTORMS
LOWS IN THE UPPER 60S
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 80S
CHANCE OF RAIN 50 PERCENT

PARTLY CLOUDY
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS AND THUNDERSTORMS IN THE EVENING
LOWS IN THE MID 60S
CHANCE OF RAIN 50 PERCENT

MOSTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE MID 80S
